about_the_game:
Step into the world of software development and build your own tech empire in Software Dev Tycoon! Start as a small, scrappy startup and grow into a software giant by managing projects, hiring skilled developers, and tackling industry challenges. Develop cutting-edge applications, take on lucrative contracts, and navigate the complex world of software engineering.

You’ll need to balance creativity and efficiency as you manage deadlines, budgets, and client expectations. Will you create the next hit app, or will your competitors outshine you in the race to innovate?

In Software Dev Tycoon, every decision matters—whether it’s choosing the right projects, managing your talent pool, or expanding your business. The road to success won’t be easy, but the rewards are limitless!

Key Features:

  • Start and grow your company: From small projects to full-scale software solutions, evolve your business and build your reputation.

  • Manage your team: Hire and train employees based on their strengths and skills.

  • Develop diverse software: Create apps, websites, and custom software to meet your clients' demands.

  • Research and innovate: Unlock new technologies and tools to stay ahead of the competition.

  • Contracts and deadlines: Balance tight schedules and budgets to deliver projects on time and keep your clients happy.

  • Market your products: Promote and sell your software, gaining users and profits to reinvest in your business.

  • Dynamic industry: Adapt to a constantly changing market as trends, technologies, and competitors evolve.

Whether you're looking for a fun and casual experience or want to strategize your way to tech stardom, Software Dev Tycoon offers a dynamic simulation of the software industry. Can you take your company to the top?

name: Software Dev Tycoon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Software Dev Tycoon is a casual management sim where you build and grow your own software empire. Take on contracts, develop groundbreaking apps, and navigate the challenges of the tech world. Balance creativity, deadlines, and resources to become a leading software development company.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
